resource.comment: Come for review. Overall doing better. Mood still low but improvig. More good days than bad. Energy levels ok. Motivation improving. Support from neighbour visits daily
MSE euthymic. Not anxious. No DSH/hallucinations/abnormal thoughts
Advised re local walking group

resource.comment: Chest clear
Swelling lower legs bilaterally. Mild pitting oedema. Heart sounds normal. No distress. Abdomen normal. No cervical lymphadenopathy. Throat normal. Ears normal
Advice to mobilise more. Review with results.

resource.comment: average 150/90 last six weeks
2 weeks cough - white sputum - no blood, 1 week nose running, 5 days sore throat, No shortness of breath
Patient to take Amlodipine 10mg tablets and monitor blood
Similar problem 3 months ago - settled after 2 weeks

resource.comment: Analgesia advice, try knee support daytime

Come for review. Overall doing better. Mood improving. Still get bad days. Energy levels ok. Motivation improving. Started to go walking twice a week. First counselor appointment in two weeks. Patient has been lightly drinking.
MSE euthymic. Not anxious. No DSH/hallucinations/abnormal thoughts
Continue with current actions and monitor progress
Patient reports the condition has cleared but develops cough when lies down to sleep.
Recommend that before sleep, patient has a hot drink. Sleep with head in elevated position.
